topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Alpha: Viewing Alarms and Logs

body.p: You can examine and filter the alarms and logs generated by HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade in order to monitor and respond to fault conditions.
body.note: This feature applies only to KVM region servers.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the Fault Management panel.

Click one of the tabs to view specific alarms:
Active Alarms
Historic Alarms

body.p: For more information on alarms, see the HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Carrier Grade: Administrator Guide.
body.section:
Viewing Active AlarmsA list of all active or set alarms in the system.
Each entry in the table includes the following variables:
UUID
AlarmID
EntityInstanceID
DateAndTime
AlarmSeverity
ReasonText
EventType
ProbableCause
ProposedRepairAction
ServiceAffecting
SuppressionAllowed

section.title: Historic Alarms
section.p: A history of set and clear alarm operations in the system. The table includes the same variables as the Active Alarm Table, plus the variable AlarmState, used to indicate whether the table entry is a SET or a CLEAR operation.
